name: wil-aui-platform
description: Work-Based Learning Platform for Al Akhawayn University

scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.start: npm run start:backend & npm run start:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'Ready for deployment - see DEPLOYMENT-GUIDE.md'

author: AUI Work-Based Learning Team
